author: vmassol
msg: Added scripts for Orion 1.x (Tested with Orion 1.5.4 and 1.6.0)

author: vmassol
msg: Removed conf files for Enhydra 3.1. We can add them back if anyone request support for Enhydra. Last Enhydra release is 5.0 on sept. 2002. Nothing seems to have moved since then... Anyone knows anything?

author: vmassol
msg: Merged all Orion 1.x configurations into one (Orion 1.5 and 1.6 configs were the same. Orion 1.4 was a bit different but let's not support Orion 1.4 ATM - We can always add it back if requested).

author: vmassol
msg: For the moment, remove config files for tomcat 3.2 and 3.3. We might add them later if support for Tomcat 3.2 or 3.3 is requested.

author: vmassol
msg: As we have dropped support for Servlet API 2.1 a long time ago, we can remove the deprecations!
